name: Olytrem
description:
I got to work only 5 hours on this project. There isn't anything fancy in here just an endless car game and avoid-the-obstacles type game. I got the musics using Chiptone and a freesound asset. Good luck in the game(you might need it). Let me know your high scores! I'll add the HTML5 versions in a few hours.

Controls: Your mouse pointer will work as the controller.

NOTE 1: When using the non web builds, set Display Resolution to 800 x 600 as that's the default.

NOTE 2: For the web build, wait 30 seconds for the game to load. If the above web build doesn't work, go to http://olytrem.bitballoon.com/ (sounds may be bugged).

Okay then, Sayonara.
